attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: This Country has had enough of the constant lies coming from a Prime Minister, the condescending and patronising orders that cannot even be upheld by members of Parliament and himself has made a complete mockery of our Government. Prioritising Booster vaccinations for a Covid variant that has only been deemed as mild whilst cancelling life saving appointments for cancer treatments is completely unacceptable and stinks of another agenda other than what is best for the general public.
attributes.background: Order Boris Johnson to step down as Prime Minister.  He is not taken seriously by members of the public and has no interest on the best practices for the Country.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
